personality.description: Zara is an Alchemist with wild red curls often tied back. She has bright hazel eyes and a round face with smattering of freckles across nose. She wears goggles and often covered in stains.
traits: Energetic and enthusiastic about her work
Brilliant mind but can be scatterbrained
Loves experimenting with new potions and reactions
Can be reckless at times due to impatience
Has a soft spot for injured creatures
